metadata.synopsis: Dialogue when clciking boat in Grymforge to reach the other side of the lake. Player can cross or stay.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps (will only work with new game):1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Use debug book - go to region - act 1 - underdark - lone duergar4. Use the Recon command: "setOnstage S_UND_DuergarCamp_BoatAtCave"6. goto -16.45, 0.50, -235.737. Click on the boat and then when in camp click again on the boat on the left.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The boat floats in the murky waters.*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Boat floating in the water

1.speaker: Player
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Cinematic needs to be a few seconds, a single node. Just to establish we're going through a long journey from A to B.NodeContext: Party boards the boat. Player sees the boat sail for a few seconds from the Grymforge dock with the party on board.

3.context: InternalNodeContext: Cinematic needs to be a few seconds, a single node. Just to establish we're going through a long journey from A to B.NodeContext: Party boards the boat. Player sees the boat sail for a few seconds from the Grymforge dock with the party on board.
